title.narrative: institutional capacities and higher participation of relevant stakeholders of child protection are increase

description.narrative: Development of internal procedures for the care of victims of violence by specialized gendarmerie police units. 20 police officers and gendarmes, 30% of whom are women, as well as the 3 female children's judges, received training as trainers on these new procedures. An Memorandum of Understanding was signed between the University Service for In-service Education (SUFOP) and UNICEF in order to organize in-service and pre-service training for social workers as part of strengthening the child protection system | Status:On-track | As-of Date:17/01/2020
